next_state: -= Kitchen =- You find yourself in a kitchen. A normal kind of place. You make out a fridge. The fridge contains a roasted lettuce, a fried pork chop and a block of cheese. You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal an oven. You can see a table. You see a cookbook and a knife on the table. You can make out a counter. But there isn't a thing on it. You swear loudly. You can make out a stove. Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. There is an open plain door leading north. You need an exit without a door? You should try going east. > -= Kitchen =-0/4
